No conversations exist for student
Student ID: S99999

3. Observe conversation list area

Dashboard loads successfully

feature: Start new conversation via 'Chat with Addie' button
preconditions: Student logged in and viewing dashboard
testSteps:
1. View dashboard
2. Click 'Chat with Addie' button (either in sidebar or top right)
3. Observe navigation and chat interface
expectedResult:
Navigate to chat interface immediately
New conversation session created
Chat input field ready and focused
Welcome message from Addie displayed (e.g., 'Hi! What would you like to talk about today?')
Student can start typing immediately
Session logged in database
